name: maxscale_exporter_collector_duration_seconds
description: Collector time duration

name: maxscale_exporter_last_scrape_error
description: Whether the last scrape of metrics from MaxScale resulted in an error (1 for error, 0 for success)

name: maxscale_exporter_scrapes_total
description: Total number of times MaxScale was scraped for metrics

name: maxscale_logging_high_precision
description: Whether high precision logging is active

name: maxscale_logging_level
description: The current logging levels active

name: maxscale_logging_maxlog
description: Whether maxlog is active

name: maxscale_logging_syslog
description: Whether syslog is active

name: maxscale_logging_throttling_count
description: The number of logging throttling events

name: maxscale_logging_throttling_suppress_milliseconds
description: The value of logging throttling suppress_ms

name: maxscale_logging_throttling_suppress_window_milliseconds
description: The value of logging throttling window_ms

name: maxscale_modules
description: MaxScale modules currently enabled

name: maxscale_monitor
description: MaxScale Monitor information

name: maxscale_server_active_operations
description: The number of active operations on the server

name: maxscale_server_adaptive_avg_select_time
description: The adaptive average select time (always zero)

name: maxscale_server_connection_pool_empty
description: The current connection pool empty count

name: maxscale_server_connections
description: The current number of connections to the server

name: maxscale_server_max_connections
description: The maximum number of connections allowed to the server

name: maxscale_server_max_pool_size
description: The current maximum pool size

name: maxscale_server_persistent_connections
description: The number of persistent connections to the server

name: maxscale_server_reused_connections
description: The number of reused connections by the server

name: maxscale_server_routed_packets
description: The number of routed packets to the server

name: maxscale_server_state
description: The current state of the server

name: maxscale_server_total_connections
description: The total number of connections to the server

name: maxscale_service_active_connections
description: The total number of active operations to the service

name: maxscale_service_connections
description: The current number of connections to the service

name: maxscale_service_state
description: The current state of each service

name: maxscale_service_statistics_connections
description: The total number of connections to the service

name: maxscale_service_statistics_failed_auths
description: The total number of failed authentications to the service

name: maxscale_service_statistics_max_connections
description: The maximum number of connections to the service

name: maxscale_service_statistics_routed_packets
description: The total number of routed packets to the service

name: maxscale_service_statistics_total_connections
description: The total number of connections to the service

name: maxscale_service_total_connections
description: The total number of connections to the service

name: maxscale_threads_accepts
description: The number of accept events

name: maxscale_threads_blocking_polls
description: The number of non-blocking poll cycles before a blocking poll

name: maxscale_threads_count
description: The number of threads in MaxScale

name: maxscale_threads_current_descriptors
description: The current number of descriptors handled by each thread

name: maxscale_threads_errors
description: The number of error events

name: maxscale_threads_event_queue_length
description: The amount of I/O events returned by one call to epoll_wait

name: maxscale_threads_hangups
description: The number of hangup events

name: maxscale_threads_load_last_hour
description: The load during the last 60 minutes

name: maxscale_threads_load_last_minute
description: The load during the last 60 seconds

name: maxscale_threads_load_last_second
description: The load during the last second

name: maxscale_threads_max_event_queue_length
description: The maximum amount of I/O events returned by one call to epoll_wait

name: maxscale_threads_max_exec_time
description: The maximum time it took to process an I/O event

name: maxscale_threads_max_queue_time
description: The maximum time before an I/O event was ready for processing (milliseconds)

name: maxscale_threads_reads
description: The number of read events

name: maxscale_threads_stack_size
description: The stack size of each worker thread

name: maxscale_threads_total_descriptors
description: The total number of descriptors handled by each thread since startup

name: maxscale_threads_writes
description: The number of write events

name: maxscale_up
description: Whether the MaxScale server is up

name: maxscale_uptime_seconds
description: MaxScale uptime in seconds

name: maxscale_version
description: MaxScale version information
